Summary: on today show on an interview, infront of the capital, to his right was an object
divs: Sighting Detailswas watching the today show, an interview live, the capital behind him and to his right a stable white object was sitting, it then moved to his right out of sight. we watched it as it moved. a good sized object.was white and round. looked solid and glowed.
trends: There have been 95 other sightings in Atlanta
There were no other sightings in Atlanta on or around December 16th 2010
